do we know what signs the user saw?
The signs of a leak that the user reported seeing, based on previous conversations, include seeing mold on the bathroom ceiling.
yes, sure i will be there

I've reached out to the dispatcher to confirm if the user has any equipment for both fixing the leak and for mold remediation, or if the specialists need to bring everything necessary. We should receive responses shortly. Is there anything else you'd like to address in the meantime?
